summary: WHILE DRIVING 70MPH ON HIGHWAY VEHICLE STARTED TO HAVE KNOCK IN ENGINE I PULLED OFF AT NEXT EXIT AND AS I WAS EXITING VEHICLE LOST POWER AND STOPPED. KNOW WARNING OR INSTRUMENT LIGHTS LIT UP BEFORE OR AFTER ENGINE FAILURE. VEHICLE ONLY HAS 10,100 MILES, LAST OIL CHANGE WAS AT 7,100 WITH RECOMMENDATION FOR OIL CHANGE AT 10,194 MILES. CALLED KIA CUSTOMER SERVICE AND THEY WERE RUDE AND NOT HELPFUL AT ALL.
